value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It's time for the winter festival,
$Nu. Come on!$k$p$EFace|Let me tell you about it... We place
presents by the pillows of children
while they're sleeping—$k$pWhat? You already know all about it?
I should have realized!$k$pBut if that's the case, we should get
going. Time for some fun!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The winter festival is quite fascinating,
actually. Its roots lie in ancient beliefs
surrounding the winter solstice...$k$pAs tradition has it, on the night of the
solstice, the gods of the underworld
take flight and go hunting...$k$pAnyone who sees them will be
marked as prey and dragged down
to the underworld.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse! That's terrifying! I thought
this festival was meant to be fun...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Now? Certainly it is! But in the past...
it was quite different. That's what I
was talking about: old traditions...$k$pThis tournament began as a way to
encourage training in combat—to
stand a chance against the gods.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The tournament! I almost forgot all
about it. I hear that the prize is pretty
amazing...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well...yes. It should be something
remarkable.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|If there's a prize to be won, then there
are battles to be fought! Prepare
yourselves!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_WinterFes17,Face|Chrom, this is bad! If we lose, then we
won't have any presents to give
everybody!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_WinterFes17,Face|That may be, but I don't see what
choice we have. We'll have to retreat
for now, Lissa.$k$p$Sbs150|
